activities: TriNetX may receive personal information about individuals in connection with its clinical data network of providers and pharmaceutical companies used to enhance clinical trial design and accelerate trial site and patient recruitment; medical investigators and staff; service providers and business partners; customers; suppliers.  TriNetX may also receive personal information from employees, potential employees and their family members; former employees; contractors and contingent workers; consultants.  These data are collected and transferred to the U.S. in support of the company's employment, research, development, regulatory, marketing, sales, financial, legal and other business activities.
personaldata: Online, offline, manually processed, automatic processing.
recoursemech: For human resources data: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).   For all other personal data: JAMS for individuals whose personal information is transferred in connection with TriNetX customer activities and certain legal and regulatory compliance activities.
